welcome.Intro: Thanks for visiting the Cirlinq platform! This page contains additional user and development information about the Cirlinq platform. The tabs describe the information for each page. The manual provide also answers to frequently asked questions.
welcome.Qu: How do I navigate quickly through the platform?
welcome.Content: The upper orange beam remains always visible. With this you can switch quickly between your project overview with 'Projects' and productoverview with 'Products'. The search button can be used to search for users, projects or products.
welcome.Footer: With the 'flag' icon the language can be changed. With the 'person' icon the user settings can be changed.

ProjectoverviewQ1.Ans: The project overview gives an overview of all your projects that you have defined in Cirlinq. You can find your projects in a clear list or based on a geographical map.

ProjectoverviewQ2.Que: How can I edit a project?
ProjectoverviewQ2.Ans: You can perform changes on a project via the icon with the icon of the three dots.

ProjectoverviewQ3.Ans: With the icon of the three dashes you can filter projects.

ProjectoverviewQ4.Que: How do I search within the projects?
ProjectoverviewQ4.Ans: With the icon of the magnifying glass you can search within the projects

ProjectoverviewQ5.Que: How do I adjust the number of projects on the project page?
ProjectoverviewQ5.Ans: The number of visible projects per page can adjusted with the dropdown menu at the bottom of the project page.

ProjectoverviewQ6.Que: What do I see on the project card?
ProjectoverviewQ6.Ans: Through the project card, all projects that you have defined in Cirlinq can be found on a map

ProjectoverviewQ7.Que1: How do I create a new project?
ProjectoverviewQ7.Ans1: Via the button ‘new project’ you can create a new project. When creating a project, the following items are recorded:
ProjectoverviewQ7.item2: ● Project information shows other project information
ProjectoverviewQ7.item3: ● Environmental factors records the environmental factors of the project
ProjectoverviewQ7.item4: ● Client, here the details of the directly involved client of the project are recorded.
ProjectoverviewQ7.item5: ● Principal, records the data of the principal, which is the initiating client.
ProjectoverviewQ7.item6: ● Building owner, here the details of the building owner are recorded. Multiple building owners can be created within one project.
ProjectoverviewQ7.Que2: How do I change the project information?
ProjectoverviewQ7.Ans2: The project information can be changed by going to the relevant project and clicking on 'project information' (see project).

ProductoverviewQ1.Ans: The product overview gives a project-transcending overview of the created products. The product overview can be used to control various parts within the product life cycle. It is also possible to view or modify properties of several products from the product overview.

ProductoverviewQ2.Que: How can I edit a product?
ProductoverviewQ2.Ans: With the icon of the three dots you can perform an action on a product.

ProductoverviewQ3.Ans: With the icon of the three dashes you can filter products.

ProductoverviewQ4.Que: How do I search within the products?
ProductoverviewQ4.Ans: With the icon of the magnifying glass you can search within the products.

ProductoverviewQ5.Que: How do I adjust the number of products on the product overview?
ProductoverviewQ5.Ans: The number of shown products per page can be adjusted with this dropdown menu at the bottom of the product page.

ProductoverviewQ6.Que: How do I select multiple products?
ProductoverviewQ6.Ans: By selecting the checkbox for the relevant product properties of a product can be adjusted. By selecting multiple products you can adjust the properties of several products simultaneously.

ProductoverviewQ7.Que: How do I create a new product?
ProductoverviewQ7.Ans: You can create a new product with the button ‘new component’. When creating a product you have to indicate to which project the product belongs.

ProjectpageQ1.Ans: Within the project page you can find which products have been applied within the project, the project information, the documents and an overview of what information has been shared within the project with whom. From the project page, information can be shared with other organizations and individuals.

ProjectpageQ2.Que: How do I manage my products within a project?
ProjectpageQ2.Ans: After creating a project you have the possibility to add products to the project. Among the components, the products that have been created can be viewed and modified within the project.

ProjectpageQ3.Que: How can I view and change my project information?
ProjectpageQ3.Ans: After creating a project, you have recorded information about the project. This information can be viewed and changed under the project information.

ProjectpageQ4.Que: How can I view and change my source files and project documents?
ProjectpageQ4.Ans: After you have created a project (see project overview> how do I create a new project?) And have created products in it, you can retrieve files via files that have used the source files and which documents belonging to the project are present.

ProjectpageQ5.Que: How do I know with which organization I have shared which information?
ProjectpageQ5.Ans: When creating a project you have the possibility to add documents belonging to the project. This information can be viewed and changed under the project information.

ProjectpageQ6.Que: How do I share my project with another user or organization?
ProjectpageQ6.Ans: After creating a project, you can share the project and the associated information sources with third parties. You have the opportunity to share the project via a shareable link or by inviting users or organizations.

ProjectpageQ7.Que: How do I manage who can see or edit my information?
ProjectpageQ7.Ans: By sharing a project, you can determine for each user or organization for each source of information what the rights are. The rights consist of having no access, being able to read only and being allowed to edit information.

ProjectpageQ8.Que: How do I manage and link an identifier to a product?
ProjectpageQ8.Ans: Identifiers can be managed or added to a product via the button. From the overview you can find which identifiers are already linked to the product. In addition, there is the possibility to add an identifier in the form of an RFID, NFC or QR. If the identifier is added, it will be visible behind the relevant product. An identifier can be added at any level within a project.

ProductpageQ1.Ans: Within the product page you can find which information sources are linked to a product within the project.From the product page all detailed information about a product can be found.The information shown depends on the available information sources.From the product detail page, information about the product in question and its components can be shared with other organizations and individuals.

ProductpageQ2.Que: How do I share my product with another user or organization?
ProductpageQ2.Ans: After creating a product, you can share the project and the associated information sources with third parties. You have the option to share the product via a shareable link or by inviting users or organizations.

ProductpageQ3.Que: How do I manage who can see or edit my information?
ProductpageQ3.Ans: By sharing a product, you can determine for each user or organization what the rights are for each source of information. The rights consist of having no access, being able to read only and being allowed to edit information.

NotificationsQ1.Ans: Within the field of notifications you can find out which (open) notifications are linked to a product. The notifications can be viewed and followed up from the product page.

NotificationsQ2.Que: How do I make a notification?
NotificationsQ2.Ans: Making a report can be done in two ways:
NotificationsQ2.Ans1: 1. Within Cirlinq go to the relevant product page where you want to make a report and then click on the 'notifications' button in the 'notifications' section.
NotificationsQ2.Ans2: 2. Scan the tag on the relevant product and click on the button 'create notifications'.

NotificationsQ3.Que: What information can I record in a notification?
NotificationsQ3.Ans: When creating a notification, contact details (name, email address and telephone number) and information about the notification (name, description, priority and photo) are recorded.

NotificationsQ4.Que: How do I know if I should anticipate quickly on a notification?
NotificationsQ4.Ans: When creating a notification, a priority is assigned (low, medium or high). You can prioritize the notification yourself by reviewing the report.

NotificationsQ5.Que: How do I know if the notification has already been picked up?
NotificationsQ5.Ans: When a notification is created, it automatically gets the status 'Open'. When the notification has been picked up but not yet resolved, the notification will be ‘Reported’. A notification can be given the status 'Closed' at the moment that no action has been taken on it. If the notification is not approved, it can be 'Rejected'. If the notification has been remedied, it can be 'Completed'.

IFCinformationQ1.Ans: Within the field of IFC information you can find out which IFC information is linked to a product. The information shown depends on the information available from the IFC model.

IFCinformationQ2.Que: How do I link my product to an IFC object?
IFCinformationQ2.Ans: Within the field of IFC information there is the possibility to link a product to an IFC entity. After clicking 'link' you have to select the relevant IFC entity to which you want to link in your viewer. After the product is linked, it is highlighted in the viewer.

SupplierQ1.Ans: Within the supplier's field you can find out which supplier has delivered the relevant product.

SupplierQ2.Que: How do I link a supplier to my product?
SupplierQ2.Ans: Within the field of supplier there is the possibility to link the supplier to a product or to disconnect it. After clicking on 'linking' you can select the relevant supplier.

SupplierQ3.Que: How do I manage my suppliers?
SupplierQ3.Ans: The suppliers are managed by the admin of the Cirlinq application.

ProductinformationQ1.Ans: Within the field of product information the template can be found with product information. The template contains structured product information about the product in question. The composition of the template can be put together per user and per product.

ProductinformationQ2.Que: How do I customize information in the template?
ProductinformationQ2.Ans: Within the different tabs of the template, the information can be changed by clicking on 'change'.

ProductinformationQ3.Que: How do I adjust the structure of the template?
ProductinformationQ3.Ans: The structure of the template has been standardized per product group and sector. The structure of the template can therefore only be changed by the admin of the Cirlinq application.

ActivitylogQ1.Ans: Within the field of the activity log, all activities performed on the relevant product are displayed. Here you can find out who changed which information on which moment.

IdentifiersQ1.Que: How do I manage and link an identifier to a product?
IdentifiersQ1.Ans: By clicking on 'manage' identifiers can be managed or added to a product. From the overview you can find which identifiers are already linked to the product. In addition, there is the possibility to add an identifier in the form of an RFID, NFC or QR. If the identifier is added, it will be visible behind the relevant product. An identifier can be added at any level within a product.

DocumentsQ1.Ans: The documents linked to the product can be found within the field of documents. From here, the attached documents can also be managed.

SubcomponentsQ1.Ans: Within the box of subcomponents, the number of subcomponents that are part of the relevant component are displayed. Form here, a deeper level of detail can be reached.

MyAccountQ1.Ans: Within the my account page you can find information about your profile, your projects and your organization.

MyAccountQ2.Que: What can I do within my profile?
MyAccountQ2.Ans: Through my profile you can view and change your profile. It is also possible to change your password here.

MyAccountQ3.Que: What can I do within my projects?
MyAccountQ3.Ans: Through my projects you can view and change already created projects. Only the admin of the organization is authorized to delete projects.

MyAccountQ4.Que: What can I do within my organization?
MyAccountQ4.Ans: Through my organization you can view and change the information of your organization. Only the admin of the organization is authorized to change the organization information. In addition to managing the organization, users can be created and managed within the organization via my organization. When creating a user, multiple roles can be assigned to the user. Only the admin of the organization is authorized to change the users for an organization.

changes.Intro: This page provides an overview of implemented changes to the application that affect the functionality and use. The changes are shown on dates:

contact.helpInfo: Do you have questions? Contact us via info@cirlinq.nl

NoIFCInfo: There is currently no IFC information associated.
